Mr. William Harley, President
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
1346 Connecticut Avenue, N. W.
Washington 6, D. C.
Dear Bills
Re your memo of May 25 -
I have always felt that it would be desirable to have more than one source
of programs in educational television.
That is as far as I can go since you do not indicate which subject areas
are being considered.
You have my full blessings -- and confidence.
a
taydon/Ausmus
Director
